name: Brackenbury Capital
overview:
Private equity investors in early stage, high growth situations.

Brackenbury Capital Group specialises in acquiring and operating a range of investments across asset classes.

The company seeks to deliver consistent and attractive risk adjusted returns from direct investment in a growing range of businesses and property holdings across both the UK and the Eurozone.

We aim to provide our partners with a steady and secure cashflow which does not rely on factors outside of the management’s control and can demonstrate resilience to external market shocks.

The firm’s strategy has been to build a team of highly motivated and seasoned investment professionals in a culture that emphasises focused deal appraisal and intelligent risk management. The company can draw on a team of former investment bankers and analysts with senior level experience gained at leading banking and accountancy firms.

Our experience is broad and encompasses most investment and asset classes. We are continually seeking new ventures and investments and can either partner with existing management or take an equity stake.
